headline: Trump Ohio Rally to Inflame MAGA-World Civil War Over J.D. Vance Senate Bid
author: Jason Lemon
sentences: Many conservatives in Ohio are supporting former state Treasurer Josh Mandel in the GOP primary, as well as several other contenders, in what's becoming a civil war among the Midwestern state's Republicans and the broader Make America Great Again (MAGA) movement.

Meanwhile, on the national stage, audio leaked this week of House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy saying he would advise Trump to resign days after the U.S. Capitol attack carried out by the then-president's supporters on January 6, 2021.

McCarthy told reporters on Friday evening that he made the comment on the leaked call as he "just walked through different scenarios," according to a video shared to Twitter by CBS News reporter Musadiq Bidar.
